infos.value: So you came here to slay that man, is that the gist of it?
...My apologies.
It was five years ago. One night, my home was attacked by a band of thieves.
My parents and my younger brother were all...
...I see. And that man was their leader, I presume?
Yes. And the last of them.
Perhaps he thought I would give up if he came this far.
Or that he would receive our protection.
But it is not so simple for one such as that to become a samurai of the east.
Hey, Raviesse. What will you do now?
That I do not know.
Huh...?
I have fulfilled my purpose...
Come now. You don’t intend to simply go back home now, do you?
Raviesse...
I have nothing...and nowhere to return to...
I threw away everything for this purpose...
You believe you have nothing. But is that truly the case?
What do you mean...?
You cleared your heart and brought down that beast.
You overcame your hatred and felled him with a merciful blade.
I would say you have the makings of a true samurai.
Me? Truly?
He speaks true, Raviesse. And I agree with him.
Do you now? Audacious words for someone who gave up on being a samurai.
Sir Owe! I wish you wouldn’t tell people about that...
You are not a samurai, Miranda? And yet you would make such a bold statement...?
I-I simply chose a different way to live my life. It is hard enough just looking after these two old men!
...Hahaha.
Haha. Finally, a smile.
It isn’t easy to admit, but...you possess skills that I do not.
I think you would make a grand samurai.
...I suppose so. Thank you.
